Style/ClassEqualityComparison.description:
Description

Enforces the use of `Object#instance_of?` instead of class comparison for equality.
Style/ClassEqualityComparison.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

AllowedMethods: ['==', 'equal?', 'eql?'] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
